articles.content: This is just the level he competes at every time, so this is what you expect every time hes out there, catcher Tomas Nido said. But I guess the plan was going a lot smoother than when its not one of … [+1020 chars]

articles.author: Mike Florio
articles.title: Sean Payton admits that “intermediaries talked” about the possibility of him coaching in Miami - NBC Sports
articles.description: Former Saints coach Sean Payton spoke to reporters on Tuesday at the Zurich Classic celebrity shootout. As he did, a few interesting things shot out of his mouth regarding the persistent rumors and reports linking him and Tom Brady to the Dolphins, a Miami pl…
